copy_start.description: API tokens identifying the accounts of trader which will be used to copy trades

assets.description: [Optional] Used to set assets to be copied. E.x ["frxUSDJPY", "R_50"]

max_trade_stake.description: [Optional] Used to set maximum trade stake to be copied.

min_trade_stake.description: [Optional] Used to set minimal trade stake to be copied.

trade_types.description: [Optional] Used to set trade types to be copied. E.x ["CALL", "PUT"]

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
